contentrichtext.text: {{italictitle}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Zebraplatys'' | image = | image_caption = | image_width = 250px | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropoda]] | classis = [[Arachnida]] | ordo = [[Spider|Araneae]] | familia = [[Salticidae]] | subfamilia = [[Marpissinae]] | genus = '''''Zebraplatys''''' | genus_authority = Zabka, 1992 | diversity_link = List of Salticidae species#Zebraplatys | diversity = 5 species | type_species = ''[[Zebraplatys fractivittata|Holoplatys fractivittata]]'' | type_species_authority = [[Eugène Simon|Simon]], 1909 | range_map = | range_map_width = 250px | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = see text }} '''''Zebraplatys''''' is a [[spider]] [[genus (biology)|genus]] of the [[Salticidae]] family (jumping spiders). ==Species== * ''[[Zebraplatys bulbus]]'' <small>Peng, Tso & Li, 2002</small> — [[Taiwan]] * ''[[Zebraplatys fractivittata]]'' <small>(Simon, 1909)</small> — [[Western Australia]] * ''[[Zebraplatys harveyi]]'' <small>Zabka, 1992</small> — [[South Australia]] to [[New South Wales]] * ''[[Zebraplatys keyserlingi]]'' <small>Zabka, 1992</small> — Western Australia * ''[[Zebraplatys quinquecingulata]]'' <small>(Simon, 1909)</small> — Western Australia ==References== * {{aut|Platnick, Norman I.}} (2007): [http://research.amnh.org/entomology/spiders/catalog/index.html The world spider catalog], version 8.0. ''American Museum of Natural History''. [[Category:Salticidae]] [[Category:Spiders of Australia]] {{salticidae-stub}}
